title: Play button isn't working, cannot launch into login screen.
body:
I've pretty much tried all the options in the experiencing a tech problem thread that concern this error and I still can't fix it. If anyone has any ideas before I go cry and watch my internet slowly re-download the entire game (which I did not long ago since I got a new computer, doing it again would be annoying), then please post below.

Update 11:57pm: Repairing also does nothing, kinda lost on what I should do at this point. Also disappointed that noones seemed to attempt to help me out at all.    
{{item:3070}} 

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for not getting to this thread sooner.

Could you please try uninstalling Adobe AIR and [reinstalling the latest version](https://get.adobe.com/air/), restart your computer and try to launch league again.

Are you still experiencing the issue?

Sorry for the late reply, busy with year 12.
I uninstalled Adobe AIR, reinstalled and restarted and the launch/play problem still persists. 
What should I do now? :(

Apologies for the delayed response, I've been quite busy with work these past few days.

Are you still experiencing the issue?
Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
